DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether subject receive V419 2 , 3 , 4 , 12 month age acceptable immune response vaccine . The study also determine whether immune response V419 similar subject receive licensed vaccine control .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Immunogenicity V419 Healthy Infants When Given 2 , 3 , 4 12 Months ( V419-007 )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Healthy infant able attend study visit Parent ( ) /legal representative able read , understand , complete study questionnaire Exclusion Criteria History congenital acquire immunodeficiency Received expect receive immunosuppressive agent systemic immunomodulatory steroid History leukemia , lymphoma , malignant melanoma , myeloproliferative disorder Hypersensitivity vaccine component history lifethreatening reaction vaccine contain substance study vaccine concomitant study vaccine Has chronic illness could interfere study conduct completion Received immune globulin , blood , bloodderived product since birth Received dose hepatitis B vaccine prior study Vaccinated acellular pertussis whole cell pertussis base combination vaccine , Haemophilus influenzae type b conjugate , poliovirus , pneumococcal conjugate pneumococcal polysaccharide , rotavirus , measles , mumps , rubella , varicella vaccine , combination thereof Fever within 24 hour prior enrollment Received nonstudy vaccine within 30 day prior enrollment , except inactivate influenza vaccine , permit 14 day prior enrollment Has coagulation disorder Has developmental delay neurological disorder Participant his/her mother medical history hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) seropositivity History measles , mumps , rubella , varicella , Haemophilus influenzae type B , hepatitis B , diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis , rotavirus , invasive pneumococcal , poliomyelitis infection
